name: The Cursed Village of Hector
description:
A Game (platformer based on a Story)

This is the story of Hector whose village was once a peaceful place to live.

Suddenly his village was attacked by evil spirits and demons who cursed the place. The natives were suddenly found missing and the glory of the village was lost.

Hector, a wizard, survived this devastation and has pledged to regain the beauty and peace of his village at any cost. He found the only way to end the curse was in 'The Temple of the Evil Spirits'.

On the night of Halloween if The Temple of the Evil Spirits is offered with Holy items, his village could come to life again. 

Hector is now on a journey. He can use his magical power to kill the evil creatures, but the curse has limited his powers. In order to retain his magic, he needs every holy item to get there.

But this journey won't be easy.

____Creators ____

Developer :- Harsh Gupta

Artists :- Sakina Mehdi and Georgia Malatesta

Sound Artist :- Jake Schatzman

Without them this won't be possible !!
